verbose_text: The Si treatment reduced incidence of hyperhydricity by decreasing the accumulation of hydrogen peroxide and malondialdehyde and lowering the activity of enzymes ascorbate oxidase and glutathione reductase [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Si treatment reduced incidence of hyperhydricity by decreasing the accumulation of hydrogen peroxide and malondialdehyde and lowering the activity of enzymes ascorbate oxidase and glutathione
